p.span: SENIORS: Please click on the link labeled "SENIOR CLASS INFO."

p.strong: Please click Letter from Yearbook Staff.pdf to read about how to submit pictures for the 2019-2020 Tatum School's Yearbook.

div.p: Please Click on the tab located on the upper left side of this website labeled "Coyote's View From Home" for Questions and Answers concerning school closure and Tatum Municipal School's Continuous Learning Plan for Students.

Haga clic en la pestaña ubicada en la parte superior izquierda de este sitio web con la etiqueta "Coyote's View From Home" para obtener preguntas y respuestas sobre el cierre de escuelas en las escuelas municipales de Tatum.
For information on the virus or any questions concerning school closures throughout New Mexico please call 1-833-551-0518.
31 Free Educational Websites Parents Can Access While Schools Are Closed. https://www.popsugar.com/family/free-online-educational-resources-for-kids-47311368
Sources for Childhood Learning on the Internet https://www.e-learningforkids.org/
Fun and Free Websites for Kids https://www.verywellfamily.com/best-free-educational-websites-for-kids-3129084
Khan Academy is an Excellent Resource for SAT Preparation: https://www.khanacademy.org/

The mission of Tatum Municipal Schools is to provide each student a superior traditional education enhanced by technological advances in a safe supportive environment that promotes self-discipline, motivation and excellence in learning. The Tatum Municipal Schools team joins the parents and community in assisting the students in developing skills to become independent and self-sufficient adults who will succeed and contribute responsibly in a global community.
